channel.title: Getting current applet properties
channel.description: what's the "command"(method?) for getting the current properties of the applet such as height and width of the applet? I need to create a square in an applet thats the same distence from all sides of the applet. I want the applet size to be custimizable.

item.title: Getting current applet properties
item.dc:creator: @Exception Exception
item.description:
@Exception wrote:

int getWidth()
int getHeight()
You can always look at the JavaDocs…
http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/api/java/applet/Applet.html

Read full topic
